name: object-from-form
description: Converts form to Javascript objects and JSON
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:dist
scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf commonjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=commonjs babel ./src --out-dir commonjs
scripts.build:es: rm -rf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es babel ./src --out-dir es
scripts.build:dist: rm -rf dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/object-from-form.js
